fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
When playing Navia Chiori teams, it is recommended to either have Constellation 1 for Chiori.

Otherwise, it is highly recommended to play Chiori with a Geo character that can produce a Geo construst. (i.e. Zhongli, Geo Traveler, Ningguang etc)
